text_en: Okay. The Orokin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_26
text_en: Right. The Corpus.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_27
text_en: Well, we've got the Grineer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_28
text_en: So, the Sentients.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_29
text_en: They ruled the Origin System. The elites had the privilege of living forever, thanks to this ritual they called Continuity.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank1Convo1_33
text_en:
whoaaaaaa NEELLY!
 hOL UP

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_30
text_en: They're this group of robot-loving, profit-obsessed plutocrats. Whatever gets them a credit, they'll do it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_31
text_en: Who're this faction of genetically mutated clones, who were originally workers until a new militarized strain was cloned to fight the Sentients -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_32
text_en: The Sentients are this artificial race, that weren't supposed to be, well, sentient, made by the Orokin, way back in time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_34
text_en: Where they'd force their consciousness into somebody else's body using this stuff called Kuva.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_35
text_en: They're currently run by this guy named Parvos Granum, who grew up a poor farmer in the Orokin era but started the Corpus profit cult.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_36
text_en: The Sentients are these - uh - a synthetic race who are kind of evil, except for the Lotus, who isn't. But her appearance and part of her persona comes from Margulis, who was an Archimedean.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_37
text_en: I guess not back in time to you? In the future to you? Whatever. Time travel.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_38
text_en: But the Grineer are after Kuva now, because the Orokin were nearly eliminated during the Old War -- there's this one Orokin in particular who was a serious asshole -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_39
text_en: He'd be long dead by now, and everybody thought he was assassinated, but he escaped to the "Granum Void" so he's possibly secretly nuts?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_40
text_en: The Orokin is an old race of people who actually made the Grineer. The Orokin used to rule the Origin System. Anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_41
text_en: Anyway, artificial race. They were sent to Tau to terraform it for the Orokin. They thought the Orokin would lay waste to Tau just like they had the Origin System, so they declared war.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_42
text_en: Named Ballas, who was in charge of the warframes and made most of them, along with Entrati? Who's also Orokin? But he - Ballas - and Margulis were also a thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_43
text_en: But one thing's for sure, he wouldn't be above cutting a deal with the Sentients. Another Corpus, Alad V, already did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_44
text_en: So, the Grineer are these genetic clones that are slowly growing more and more defective and they have this deranged Queen and -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_45
text_en: Only Natah got captured and held prisoner on Lua until Ballas imprinted Margulis's persona and appearance on to her so he could control the Tenno.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_46
text_en: Who was the lady that the Lotus resembles, but isn't, because the Lotus is actually a Sentient, which is a kind of artificial race, who are usually kind of evil, but she's -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank1Convo1_47
text_en: Oh yeah, the Sentients are this artificial race - you'd call them robots - who are usually evil, but except for the Lotus, who isn't, but is based on -

text_en: Warned you lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_473
text_en: like who does that? who does the coding bit?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_474
text_en: how does all that WORK?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_475
text_en: Most times? It was Executor Nihil. The Glassmaker.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank6Convo1_2720
text_en: in the words of the immortal quincy, C'MON, FAMALAM

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_2725
text_en: Why're you asking, Amir...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_478
text_en: sounds like a badass lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_479
text_en: He's a serial killer, Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_480
text_en: Yeah. If you think slaughtering people and sucking out their souls against their will is badass.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_482
text_en: I don't want to talk about this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_483
text_en: Cephalons, and being turned into one, isn't *cute* or *fun.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_484
text_en: Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_485
text_en: never said they were

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_486
text_en: i'm just curious

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_487
text_en: Stop asking me about cephalons. Seriously.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_488
text_en: because it sounds like something out of a scifi movie

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_489
text_en: The Cephalon program was the ultimate punishment. Something even worse than execution.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_490
text_en: Perpetual servitude. Being *remade.* Edited to the liking of the Orokin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_491
text_en: k

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_492
text_en: it sounds like magic and i just wanna understand it more

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_493
text_en: tech is my thing

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_494
text_en: Is that the only reason?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_495
text_en: Sigh. Well, I'll tell you what I know about the tech, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_496
text_en: There's this "Cephalon Weave" that they become a part of. They don't really have physical bodies like we think of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_498
text_en: Amir?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_499
text_en: They're also programmed with "precepts" or life missions - sometimes they choose them themselves, other times they're... forced to have them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_500
text_en: like what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_501
text_en: Cephalon Suda.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_502
text_en: Necraloid, for example.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_503
text_en: Like Ordis.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_504
text_en: He... used to be very different, when he was a person. Very *very* different.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_505
text_en: She used to be an Archimedean - one of the leaders of the Orokin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_506
text_en: He's kind of a special case, made by Entrati. Since he's a "copy" and not the real guy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_507
text_en: But when the man he was pissed off the Orokin, they edited him and made him serve the Tenno. Protect the kids like me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_508
text_en: Dedicated her life to the pursuit of knowledge and documenting the universe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_509
text_en: Still not sure how Entrati managed that. But if there's one thing that bastard is good at, it's cheating the system.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_510
text_en: But when she started to get sick, and her mind started to fail? She voluntarily glassed herself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_511
text_en: But Necraloid is programmed to serve the Entrati family in place of Loid himself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_512
text_en: Becoming Cephalon Suda. But her mission is still the same. Learn. Document. Understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_513
text_en: sooo the orokin people are the ones who did the code edits

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_514
text_en: soooo entrati knows how to glass people and do the code edits?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_515
text_en: Seriously, why're you so interested in cephalons?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_516
text_en: entrati used to be orokin, didn't he? or...will be...or was..or is?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_517
text_en: cuz he used to be orokin. or...will be, or was...or...is?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_518
text_en: fuggin time travel

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_519
text_en: but he knows how

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_520
text_en: Yeah, but he took off, even if you wanted to ask him about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_521
text_en: yeah but he might have left research or notes or SOMETHING kicking around

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_522
text_en: no reason

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_523
text_en: hmmmmmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_524
text_en: brb

text_en: Mech-e?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_526
text_en: That sounds like a lot of fun, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_527
text_en: And just when I thought your hobbies couldn't waste more time...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_528
text_en: i'll let you get back to whatever important shit you're doing

text_en: it was!! we usually made it pretty far. got semifinals once. but there was this one spinny bastard that always would take us out...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_530
text_en: lol sorry mechanical engineer. vs electrical engineer. i do mostly code, but, y'know, dabble in wiring.

text_en: aaaah the memories, back when rampant destruction was *fun* and *recreational*

text_en: ::sigh::

text_en: You okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_534
text_en: yeah, i just...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_535
text_en: How'd you get out here, anyway?

text_en: it's not an impressive story, its super stupid actually

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_537
text_en: like most of the shit i do

text_en: fuggin, look around

text_en: arthur, aoi, lettie, quincy--all soldiers, and eleanor's been on the ground covering wars for YEARS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo2_541
text_en: i don't belong here, i'm just... look at me, i...

text_en: yeah. i'm fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_543
text_en: You don't *sound* fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_544

text_en: or alcoholism lmao

text_en: awww....thanks

text_en: 'n smash some buttons in the arcade

text_en: whooooaaaaa what?!?!

text_en: can *I* be a floating glass brain? i wanna be a floating glass brain that sounds freaking amazing

text_en: I don't like where this is going.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo2_556
text_en: I really don't think you do.

text_en: Sure, buddy. Whatever you say.

text_en: AAAGHHH

text_en: anyway i guess the future sucks and is boring i'm gonna go work on my game byyeee

text_en: So where'd you learn to hack?

text_en: What's your favorite game?

text_en: LMAO

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_572
text_en: ooooh like console, board game, computer, arcade, card, or TTRPG?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_573
text_en: Never mind, then. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_574
text_en: What?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_575
text_en: listen, future, i know you have those cool... stabby wrist thingies that let you be a total l33t h4XX0r without knowing a single line of C++ or python

text_en: listen, drifter, i know you have those cool... stabby wrist thingies that let you be a total l33t h4XX0r without knowing a single line of C++ or python

text_en: but like you don't "learn how to hack" you learn how to code lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_578
text_en: even then only like 25% of it's actual code the other 75% is guessing people's stupid passwords

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_579
text_en: and MAN DO PEOPLE HAVE SOME STUPID FRIGGIN PASSWORDS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_580
text_en: like my BOSS at the O.R.O?! the HEAD OF IT, right?! THE GUY IN CHARGE OF IT?! HIS PASSWORD?!

text_en: Admin1234!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_582
text_en: But that ! made it so much more secure, Amir. lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_583
text_en: .... BRB gotta go change my passwords...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_584
text_en: RIGHT?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_585
text_en: ROFLMAO

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_586
text_en: i figure they probably use biometric sensor thingies for you guys in the future, yeah?

text_en: probably pretty hard to hack that shit, given how many languages and protocols there are...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_588
text_en: i mean, unless you had some sort of like... universal hack translator... thingy...

text_en: like a SUPER DUPER FLOPPY DISK or something that you could just shove in there and go WAM lol not like they use floppy disks in the future

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_590
text_en: anyway yeah so i learned how to CODE ever since i was little, knew how to type before i knew how to spell.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_591
text_en: the rest you just get from learning to predict how dumb people are with technology

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_592
text_en: speaking of gotta go hack quincy's account, talk about a shitty password, brb...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_593
text_en: I am suddenly regretting asking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_594
text_en: What's a TTRPG?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_595
text_en: Computer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_596
text_en: Arcade.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_597
text_en: yeah well your mom's face regrets asking

text_en: YOU DON'T KNOW?!?!?! OH MY LUA

text_en: oh well see there's caliber chicks which i LOVE but there's also Van Helsing vs the Countessa which i love because of the art

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_600
text_en: well there are tons of great ones but i'm kinda biased because um... i'm actually working on designing one

text_en: and NO i have no idea what that means and i don't care

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_602
text_en: it stands for table top role playing game and they are like the best thing EVER

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_603
text_en: you get to sit around a table and make up characters like dwarves and elves and half-orcs

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_604
text_en: and you get to be a paladin or a wizard or a knight or whatever, and then the dungeon master tells you a story and you act it out

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_605
text_en: but like pretend act it out with dice and stuff and usually there's snacks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_606
text_en: ...as i'm describing this i realize this makes zero friggin sense, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_607
text_en: Absolutely zero. lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_608
text_en: It sounds fun, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_609
text_en: i promise it's great

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_610
text_en: IT IS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_611
text_en: but the downside is you need a bunch of friends to play with...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_612
text_en: and every time I ask the Hex they usually tell me they'd rather lick the floor of the food court clean than play

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_613
text_en: so Y'KNOW, there's THAT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_614
text_en: Maybe I can talk them into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_615
text_en: Ah, well. Is there a game the two of us can play?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_616
text_en: you can trrryyyyy but be careful, quincy threatened to shoot me last time i asked

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_617
text_en: the game is really only good with like... at least four people. so you'll need to get two to say yes, but more is better

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_618
text_en: Eh, never mind. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_619
text_en: I'll see what I can do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_620
text_en: don't blame ya

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_622
text_en: yeah!! let's do that instead. involves fewer threats of violence lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_623
text_en: You can teach me one of your games and I'll teach you one of mine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo3_624
text_en: gaaaames frooooom spaaaaaaaace!! friggin DEAL

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_625
text_en: You're designing a computer game?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo3_626
text_en: Wouldn't it be better to get a productive hobby? We *are* in a warzone.

text_en: iiiii have no clue lmao

text_en: like i said early stages but hey who knows it's not like i have much else to do when i'm trapped in a hellscape

text_en: but hey if you fill the blank spaces with a billion hobbies then you can't hear all the little voices whispering "yer gunna die tomorrow alone and unloved"

text_en: I'M DESIGNING A GAME

text_en: WHICH I SHOULD GET BACK TO

text_en: sup, future

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_640
text_en: sup, drifter

text_en: gotta second?

text_en: I'm out. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_646
text_en: ok so don't laugh but i'm designing a video game in my spare time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_647
text_en: Yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_648
text_en: What about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_649

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_650
text_en: i'd TALK it through with somebody but if i rattle off more ideas at any of the hex i think they're gonna stuff me in a dumpster lol

text_en: That's cool!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_652
text_en: Why would I laugh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_653
text_en: You really should get better hobbies, man.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_654
text_en: you... really think so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_655
text_en: i mean i'm not trying to pop a bottle of bubbly at the pity party

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_656
text_en: well at least you didn't laugh

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_657
text_en: but everybody else does, so why wouldn't you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_658
text_en: Yeah, of course.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_659
text_en: No. I'm just screwing with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_660
text_en: ... awesome

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_661
text_en: fell for the football trick again...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_662
text_en: I am not going to judge people for what they do in their spare time, trust me. ... Don't get me started on Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_663
text_en: Yikes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_664
text_en: Anyway. Your game?

text_en: there's this bit of it that i can't figure out what i wanna do with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_666
text_en: i was wondering if i could just talk you through the issue and maybe you can help me come up with a solution

text_en: rattle off more ideas at any of the hex i think they're gonna stuff me in a dumpster lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_668
text_en: I'd love to help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_669
text_en: Sure, go ahead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_670
text_en: I'd rather eat my old socks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_671
text_en: sw33t

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_672
text_en: whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_673
text_en: soooooo okay i've gotten into this problem with *doors,* right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_674
text_en: THEY'RE SUPER COMPLICATED

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_675
text_en: Go on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_676
text_en: Doors...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_677
text_en: OKAY so i want this to be multiplayer but i also want it to be an exploration platformer game so some doors open and some doors don't but some doors are LOCKED until you have a KEY right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_678
text_en: i guess i could just make KEYS a global state and just make it highest takes precedence, right? like if somebody in your group has a key everybody in your group benefits, it's kind of an exploit but hey it means higher ranked people will just help lower ranked people that's not a bad thing, power fantasy right

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_679
text_en: Right...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_680
text_en: You could try -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_681
text_en: okay so how do i communicate what doors are decorative and which ones are just locked and what do i do if one player has a key and the other one doesn't and what do i do if one player goes through a door and the other one doesn't do i like teleport that other player?!?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_682
text_en: I mean -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_683
text_en: Well,

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_684
text_en: Right, but

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_685
text_en: Okay, and

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_686
text_en: and as for communicating locked i guess i could just have a lock show up for a second and a KNOCKKNOCK sound effect play if it's locked, and if it's decorative it's just not interactive, y'know? YEAH that works!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_689
text_en: AND OH I KNOW if someone is ready to move ahead but somebody else is lagging i can just pop up text that's like "x number of players are waiting for you.." kind of thing, and just gently nudge the laggers to kind of hurry up. PERFECT!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_690
text_en: You're... welcome?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank2Convo4_691
text_en: Yeah, um. Anytime.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_762
text_en: the orokin, that it was a punishment, kind of

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_763
text_en: but can they still *feel* or are they just *lines of code*?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_764
text_en: Wait back up. "Kind of" a punishment?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_765
text_en: They can still feel. Or so they say. I don't know for sure, I'm not one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_766
text_en: yeah well right now i really don't see a downside lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_767
text_en: live forever no body

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_768
text_en: all the worst bits of you fixed

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_769
text_en: i fail to see the frickin' problem, sign me the hell up i thought you said this was a punishment rofl

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_770
text_en: Amir, no... you don't understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_771

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_772
text_en: Holy shit, no. I can't have this conversation. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_773
text_en: explain it to me, then, cuz

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_774
text_en: you know what my favorite part of code, is?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_775
text_en: when it's broken and it doesn't work? i can FIX IT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_776
text_en: and even if it doesn't make any sense at the moment?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_777
text_en: i just need to figure it out. the answer is there somewhere

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_778
text_en: code isn't SUBJECTIVE like ART. like PEOPLE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_779
text_en: so sometimes i just wish...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank2Convo4_2083
text_en: THIS HAS BEEN SO HELPFUL, THANKS!! YOU'RE THE BEST!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_781
text_en: Amir? You okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_782
text_en: You there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_783
text_en: People *aren't* code. People *shouldn't be* code. As tempting as it might be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_784
text_en: really? you agree with me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_785
text_en: NO. Do you know what you're even saying?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_786
text_en: Yeah. Live forever, never get sick, *and* I can delete all the memories of every time I was ever awkward.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_788
text_en: exactly! like okay maybe the orokin had super bad motives and were using the cephalons for terrible things

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_789
text_en: Monsters.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_790
text_en: The Orokin. An ancient race that used to rule the Origin System. Well, *will* rule the Origin System.

text_en: look, bippy, if you're not gonna give me real answers

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_796
text_en: Why're you so interested in cephalons?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_797
text_en: The Orokin *were* monsters, Amir. Like I said earlier, they created cephalons as a punishment worse than death.

text_en: you said they used to be people, but are now digital and edited, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_799
text_en: They stripped out people's souls, edited them to their liking, and forced them into servitude.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_800
text_en: like all the bad code was removed?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_801
text_en: I feel like you're focusing on the wrong part here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_802
text_en: And *forced into servitude.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_803

text_en: like if somebody invented a ray gun that cured cancer but also they could use it to turn people into zombies

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_805
text_en: would you never use it to cure cancer ever again, if you could turn off the "and also zombies" setting?

text_en: Some of them are my best friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_808
text_en: Where are you going with this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo1_809
text_en: i'm just saying that the monster in the story wasn't evil, the man who made him out of corpses WAS

text_en: and neither was the science behind the monster

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_811
text_en: I don't think I like it when you make sense, Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo1_812
text_en: You don't understand the cost of becoming a cephalon. You really don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_859
text_en: He's my best friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo2_873

text_en: Yeah?

text_en: Otak was badly damaged and they had to upload him into the same shell Necraloid uses.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_883
text_en: Otak doesn't really seem to notice he's damaged. Ordis, on the other hand...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_884
text_en: There are a lot more downsides than just the one, Amir. Like being preprogrammed.

text_en: I don't think you do!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_887

text_en: what's cy's deal?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_897
text_en: Cy is a Command Cephalon from the Old War. He... was ordered to complete a mission which involved murdering his entire crew.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_898
text_en: But he was programmed, like Ordis.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_899
text_en: But he was programmed. I don't think he really had a choice, despite the guilt he carries over it.

text_en: whats ordis do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_903

text_en: what're cephalons?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_905

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank3Convo2_906

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1406
text_en: um, remember a while ago, when i told you about those nightmares i was having...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1407
text_en: um, remember that fight we had a while ago... when i wasn't okay and you asked why i wasn't okay...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1408
text_en: and i said it wasn't anything but it obviously WAS and... yeah... that whole thing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1409
text_en: i was wondering if you had a second i just i need someone to talk to and nobody...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1410
text_en: nobody gets it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1411
text_en: I don't remember, actually. Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1412
text_en: I remember. Why?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1413
text_en: Gets what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1414
text_en: I'm here to listen, if you need to talk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1415
text_en: well first i just wanted to say um *sorry* about all that losing my temper shit

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1416
text_en: i'm sorry i couldn't talk about it then, i just... it's rough

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1417
text_en: it's just that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1418
text_en: i'm not

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1419
text_en: i don't

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1420
text_en: i don't BELONG here

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1421
text_en: you heard my story, i was a FREAKING INTERN

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1422
text_en: who clicked on shit he shouldn't have and was stupid enough to think he was special

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1423
text_en: who got mixed up with the wrong people at the wrong time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1424
text_en: i'm not a soldier like everyone else, or used to seeing war like eleanor

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1425
text_en: i don't know how to - to cope - and - and the nightmares...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1426
text_en: the scaldra are the baddies

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1427
text_en: how can i be a hero if i wake up crying

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2052
text_en: so i was wondering if we could talk about it... if that's okay...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2053
text_en: so... um...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1428
text_en: because i see their faces as they're dying

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1429
text_en: because i killed them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1430
text_en: how

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1431
text_en: please

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1432
text_en: Oh, Sol... Amir... I don't know, and I wish I could tell you. But you belong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1433
text_en: I've been where you are. I still am where you are, sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1434
text_en: Have you talked to Arthur about this?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1435
text_en: I don't think I can help you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1436
text_en: You're doing the best you can. And that's all anybody can ask.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1437
text_en: I was just a kid when the Man in the Wall turned the parents on us aboard the Zariman.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1438
text_en: He cares about you. A lot. Like a little brother.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1439
text_en: Including yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1440
text_en: And I had to witness the slaughter. And I had to...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1441
text_en: He might know how to help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1442
text_en: And I'm going to say it all caps in hopes it sinks in this time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1443
text_en: And I still have nightmares sometimes. About that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1444
text_en: i'm just so embarrassed...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1445
text_en: YOU. BELONG. HERE.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1446
text_en: About what's followed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1447
text_en: Don't be. Everyone needs help sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1448
text_en: A mentor of mine once said "only a stubborn fool refuses a needed hand to stay seated in the mud."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1449
text_en: It's normal to feel embarrassed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1450
text_en: And that's okay. Talking about it is... supposed to help. lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1451
text_en: yeah...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1452
text_en: sounds like an epic dude

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo5_2734
text_en: first of all, HEATHEN!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2054
text_en: this one was worse than usual and i was just wondering if you didn't mind

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1454
text_en: all right, i'll go talk to arthur even if it's the last thing in the world i wanna do

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1455
text_en: ::snort::

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1456
text_en: He is. And I was a very stubborn fool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1457
text_en: People care about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1458
text_en: nothing normal about any of this situation

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1459
text_en: literally any of it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1460
text_en: ::sigh:: thanks for listening... i'll just... go play some more games and go back to bed

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1461
text_en: yeah right

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1462
text_en: i just get in the way, i'm the annoying little brother on a good day

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1463
text_en: and the liability on a bad one

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1464
text_en: hngghhhkkkkkkkkk

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1465
text_en: *I* care about you, Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1466
text_en: I mean it, the Hex cares. *We* care.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1467
text_en: Okay, well, Quincy is a special case, but -

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1468
text_en: Look, Amir. I've tried convincing you, but you're not 12 anymore. This isn't school.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1469
text_en: you're right it isn't it's a fracking warzone with MONSTERS IN IT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1470
text_en: lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1471
text_en: The rest of us really do care.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1472
text_en: AND WE'RE THE MONSTERS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1473
text_en: You're my dear friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1474
text_en: As... more than a friend, if I'm being honest...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1475
text_en: So, yeah. I care about you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1476
text_en: never mind

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1477
text_en: And I don't know how to prove it to you except to say it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1479
text_en: i can't really process that right now, but...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1480
text_en: thank you...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1481
text_en: And to be here when you need me to be here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1482
text_en: ... thanks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1483
text_en: So if you get those nightmares again, and you want to talk?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1484
text_en: I don't care what time it is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo2_1485
text_en: Come get me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo2_1486
text_en: seriously

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2055
text_en: i'm not a soldier, not like the others, and i just... i know scaldra are the baddies and all but they're also PEOPLE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1487
text_en: i talked to arthur about my nightmares

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1488
text_en: like you suggested

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1489
text_en: i thought he was gonna laugh at me... or roll his eyes, y'know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1490
text_en: didn't expect him to haul off and... hug me...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1491
text_en: big tough arthur, looked like he was gonna cry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1492
text_en: told me he had no idea i was hurting that badly...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1493
text_en: we sat and talked for a long time about all the shit he's seen in war...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1494
text_en: all the nightmares he's had... still has...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirArthurNightmares_1495
text_en: so... yeah, thanks drifter.

text_en: Amir, seriously, you're obsessed.

text_en: What about them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1509
text_en: yeah well it's part of the gig of being me i guess

text_en: have a thought and there it is and i'm gonna follow it

text_en: there was something you said about them that i NEEEEED to know more about

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1512
text_en: No, and I'm sick of you asking about them. *Stop.*

text_en: oh come on

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1514
text_en: You're not going to let this go, are you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1515
text_en: Sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1516
text_en: NOOOOOOPE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1517
text_en: i'm just CURIOUS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1518
text_en: Clearly, you're not. Clearly, you have something else going on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1519
text_en: No. Stop.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1520
text_en: whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1521
text_en: What are you getting at with all these questions about Cephalons?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1522
text_en: you suck

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1523

text_en: we can agree on the fact the oro-whoozy-kin-whowevers who did the reprogramming

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1525
text_en: like okay so we agree about the whole "cephalons aren't evil the people reprogramming them were"

text_en: but i'm curious

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1527
text_en: were probably not the people who should be doing it, yeah? the orokin should NOT have been in charge of of the process

text_en: or should be? will be? fuggin time travel ffffk whatever you get where i'm going

text_en: do you think people should be able to willingly turn themselves into cephalons?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1530
text_en: y'know, be immortal if they want to be? edit themselves?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1531
text_en: I think we can agree on that, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1532
text_en: No. I think that cephalons shouldn't ever be made.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1533
text_en: Honestly, it was their design. They had the right to use it how they wanted to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1534
text_en: If they wanted to use their invention to rip the souls out of their victims and reprogram to be eternal servants, so be it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1536
text_en: awesome

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1537
text_en: because i've been thinking about it, and like -

text_en: what if you had a terminal illness or were super important and smart

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1539
text_en: .... ooookaay...

text_en: oh the microwave just dinged my lavapocket is done brb

text_en: it's like they invented the cure for cancer and used it to torture people how didn't they see what they had?!

text_en: it's IMMORTALITY but BETTER

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1543
text_en: live forever as the best version of yourself

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1544
text_en: sign. me. up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1545
text_en: It does sound kind of awesome now that you put it that way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1546
text_en: And who gets to decide what the best version of yourself is?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1547
text_en: And who gets to decide who lives forever?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1548
text_en: No.

text_en: welp ok then

text_en: RIGHT?!

text_en: what do you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1555
text_en: Okay, but what if they're wrong?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1556
text_en: How would that work?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1557
text_en: Exactly. The Orokin were ageless. They could transfer their consciousness into new bodies.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1558
text_en: The Orokin got to choose who lived forever. And they were monsters.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1559
text_en: Every time someone in the Origin System gets to live forever, it goes wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1560
text_en: The Sentients don't age, and they keep coming back trying to exterminate us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1561
text_en: Cephalons are only harmless because they've been *programmed* to be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1562
text_en: Neutered. Hollow.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1563
text_en: They're little more than your kinegotchi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1564
text_en: Even when they went willingly, like Cephalon Suda, what's left isn't whole.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1565
text_en: Just a facsimile. A broken replica. Nothing more.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1566
text_en: It's like an aging parent or grandparent who has started to forget your name.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1567
text_en: Missing pieces of the past. Pieces of themselves.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1568
text_en: Say a person suffers from depression. So they say "make it so I never feel sorrow again."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1569
text_en: Say a person suffers from anxiety. So they say "make it so I never feel fear again."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1570
text_en: What if a person is self-conscious about their sense of humor? So they say "make me never feel joy again."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1571
text_en: Are they really themselves anymore? Who is left behind?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1572
text_en: What if that part of them was actually cherished by everyone who loved them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1573
text_en: And they just couldn't see it through their own self-loathing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1574
text_en: That's the immortality you're after, Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo3_1575
text_en: That's a cephalon.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo3_1577
text_en: gotta go think...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2057
text_en: and i just i see their faces in my dreams staring at me and i can't... i don't know what to do and then..

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1578
text_en: can you tell me more about ordis?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1579
text_en: do you have many friends in the future?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1580
text_en: like people who're gonna miss you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1581
text_en: Maybe? Like Ordis.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1582
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1583
text_en: Sure. What do you want to know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1584
text_en: whossat

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1585
text_en: He's my friend and helper.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1586
text_en: He tries his best to keep me safe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1587
text_en: it sounds like he'll really miss you

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1588
text_en: He's used to waiting centuries for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1589
text_en: He's got the kid to worry about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1590
text_en: i feel like i missed something

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1591
text_en: I really don't want to talk about this. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1592
text_en: you two have a kid together?!?!?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2058
text_en: i just need to tell somebody about the nightmare i had last night before it bores a hole in my head

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1593
text_en: What?! NO!! No, I mean there's another version of me!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1594
text_en: I'm going to go die now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1595
text_en: I'm one half of a paradox that was created a long time ago.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1660
text_en: i want an epic name like that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1597
text_en: Long story short, I aged and the kid didn't. So Ordis kind of looks over us both.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1598
text_en: oh yeah way more normal, can't see why i didn't jump straight to that conclusion

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1599
text_en: well now that i have a new fun thing to think about including 'paradox mini YOU' stuck in my head

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1600
text_en: imma go smash some buttons in the arcade 'n we can catch up later

text_en: He's a cephalon.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1602
text_en: cephalon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2059
text_en: Can't chat right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1603
text_en: And before you start off on your OML CEPHALON obsession, let me finish.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1604
text_en: A sort of disembodied, digital consciousness. A glass brain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1605
text_en: Made by the Orokin as a form of ultimate punishment, worse than death.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1606
text_en: Reprogrammed to the Orokin's whim and liking, and set to serve for eternity.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1607
text_en: i dunno, sounds pretty awesome to me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1608
text_en: Explain?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1609
text_en: I'm out. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1610
text_en: I feel like you didn't read what I just wrote there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1611
text_en: be immortal, get to edit out the parts of yourself you don't like?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1612
text_en: sounds like a sweet gig to me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1613
text_en: just sounds like the guys doing the programming were assholes, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1614
text_en: like, if you had a ray that cured cancer but had an OPTIONAL setting to turn people into zombies

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo4_1615
text_en: would you call the invention a failure because one person kept the OPTIONAL setting on?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1616
text_en: I... don't like it when you make sense, Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1617
text_en: I don't think you understand the ramifications of what I'm describing.

text_en: imma go have a think we'll talk again soon byyyyeee

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2060
text_en: Yeah, of course. Talk me through it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1621
text_en: Ordis... he's my friend. But he was programmed to be that way. To serve the Tenno. To be our loyal protector. Forever.

text_en: No. I just don't want to fuel your weird obsession.

text_en: whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1640

text_en: He just hated them that much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1643
text_en: He wanted to go out bloody.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1644
text_en: So he killed every single one he could get his hands on. Or so he thought he did. But Orokin are very, very hard to kill.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank4Convo4_1647
text_en: And made him chipper. And happy. And loyal. And gone is the bloody mercenary that was.

text_en: ... have... have you been getting into lettie's supplies?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo6_1875
text_en: gonna give them some sick ass whips 'n shit

text_en: so yeah sorry but i think i need to take a break from this US thing if this is how you're going to be when i need help

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo6_1883
text_en: but ooOoOookaaAAAaayy
