name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo6_1885
text_en: THANKS SCHMOOPY

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank4Convo6_1886
text_en: THANKS BUDDY

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2071
text_en: Wait, hold on, just like that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1887
text_en: hey... hon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1888
text_en: hey... d?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2072
text_en: Okay, I understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1889
text_en: you around?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1890
text_en: having a rough moment and i'd really appreciate someone to talk to

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2092
text_en: so i was an intern for the O.R.O. at the nuclear power plant in their software dev department working on information security

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1891
text_en: I can't right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1892
text_en: Of course. What do you want to talk about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1893
text_en: look i know i keep coming back around to them and it's starting to drive you crazy but

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1894
text_en: i know you told me to never talk about cephalons with you again

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1895
text_en: but ever since you told me about them i just keep coming back to them in my head

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1896
text_en: cephalons

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1897
text_en: i just... please? can we just dig into them a little deeper? i just want to know more and it'll give me something else to focus on

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1898
text_en: something other than the bees in my head

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1899
text_en: No.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1900
text_en: Okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1901
text_en: I'm not comfortable with how obsessed you are with them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1902
text_en: um

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1903
text_en: i don't ask for much i really don't

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1904
text_en: ok

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1906
text_en: but i need you to be there for me when i need you to be

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1907
text_en: and if you can't i don't... i don't know if i can keep doing this sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1908
text_en: i don't want to be a burden on you but i also can't feel like i am either

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1909
text_en: I understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1910
text_en: Wait, sorry. I didn't mean it. [Apologize.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1911
text_en: no i get it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1912
text_en: i'm a lot it's fine

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1913
text_en: i... gtg

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1914
text_en: sorry this didn't work out i guess

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1915
text_en: thanks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1916
text_en: seriously

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1917
text_en: it's just hard for me to explain why i can't stop fixating on them i guess

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1918
text_en: I get it. We're all afraid to die.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1919
text_en: I get it. It's nice to think about not being trapped here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1920
text_en: I get it. You think you'd be better at being in charge of the "programming."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1921
text_en: I get it. You think it'd be fun to be a computer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1922
text_en: it's just so hard for me to explain why

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1923
text_en: it isn't the immortality thing that i'm really interested in

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1924
text_en: i get why that's a silly idea and why nobody should live forever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1925
text_en: no, that's not it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1926
text_en: having a real hard time looking at the mess entrati's made and going yeah good job there buddy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1927
text_en: great use of functional immortality

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1928
text_en: so if he's one of the greatest scientific minds of all time like you said why should i live forever? nah that's not it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1929
text_en: and besides now that we're stuck in 1999 forever... i guess we ARE kind of immortal, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1930
text_en: that's not really it, honestly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1931
text_en: i know lettie is super bent out of shape about never getting to leave and being stuck in a time loop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1932
text_en: but it honestly doesn't bother me much

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1933
text_en: i have everything i could ever want right here

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1934
text_en: games, snacks, computers, my new family

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1935
text_en: my snugglemuffin :}

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1936
text_en: one of my closest friends

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2073
text_en: so i know when i tried to tell you what happened to me after entrati gave me that vial

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1937
text_en: i'm set here

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1938
text_en: nah i shouldn't have that kind of power i know that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1939
text_en: nobody should it seems like absolute power corrupts absolutely yadda yadda

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1940
text_en: as tempting as it'd be to say otherwise and say OOH YEAH NO I WOULDN'T BE THE BADDIE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1941
text_en: who can really say for sure? look at rusalka and vodyanoi. look at entrati. none of them woke up one morning being like Y'KNOW WHAT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1942
text_en: I'M GONNA BE THE ASSHOLE FROM NOW ON

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1943
text_en: i'm gonna bet even the orokin thought they were doing the right thing the whole time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1944
text_en: so, nah, my ego's not that big believe me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1945
text_en: beep boop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1946
text_en: i mean sure but not really

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1947
text_en: especially with what you've told me about how cephalons tend to come out the other side... not okay

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1948
text_en: it's not about it being FUN...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1949
text_en: not at all...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1950
text_en: it's just...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1951
text_en: Take your time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1952
text_en: What is it, then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2074
text_en: so i told you how i worked at the oro but i never told you how i got HERE here...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1953
text_en: do you know what it's like to live your life knowing your head is broken

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1954
text_en: knowing that there's something wrong with you that you can't fix without meds that sometimes work and sometimes make everything ELSE so much worse

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1955
text_en: that people can't stand to be around you because of it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1956
text_en: always left wondering are these people really my friends

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1957
text_en: or

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1958
text_en: or is it just pity

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1959
text_en: so yeah i know cephalons are MESSED. UP.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1960
text_en: but give the opportunity to go in and... and just...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1961
text_en: and just fix myself?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1962
text_en: just get into the parts of my code that don't work and just

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1963
text_en: fix it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1964
text_en: so...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1965
text_en: so yeah...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1966
text_en: that's why...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2075
text_en: i don't think i ever told you how i got into this mess and if i don't none of this nightmare's gonna make any sense at all so here goes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1967
text_en: Oh, sweetheart...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1968
text_en: Oh, Amir...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1969
text_en: Holy shit, are you serious?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1970
text_en: So, there's a cephalon I know named Ordis.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1971
text_en: Remember Ordis?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1972
text_en: yeah ordan karris

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1973
text_en: yeah ordan karris

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1974
text_en: the guy who slept with ballas's wife right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1975
text_en: Yeah, um... I lied about that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1976
text_en: the beast of bones who got glassed for trying to slaughter a bunch of them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1978
text_en: oh cool that's great

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1979
text_en: how much else have you lied about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1980
text_en: no no don't bother telling me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1981
text_en: i don't wanna know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1982
text_en: this was such a mistake

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2076
text_en: i just... couldn't quite get through the story

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1983
text_en: What I didn't tell you earlier?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1984
text_en: I told you about Ordis. That wasn't his original name.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1985
text_en: oh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1986
text_en: He lives onboard the orbiter and was programmed by the Orokin to protect the Tenno.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1987
text_en: But that isn't who he used to be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1988
text_en: He was called the Beast of Bones. He was a bloody mass-murderer whose real name was Ordan Karris.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1989
text_en: Back in the day, he was Ordan Karris, a mercenary who made a name for himself working for the Orokin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1990
text_en: He was programmed not only to protect and serve the Tenno...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1991
text_en: But to love us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1992
text_en: oh no...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1993
text_en: He doesn't have a CHOICE but to be my friend because of what the Orokin did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1994
text_en: Every time he almost remembers who he was, he forces himself to forget again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1995
text_en: oh sol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_1996
text_en: why?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1997
text_en: The Orokin went into his mind and took all the pieces out they didn't like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1998
text_en: Because when he starts to recall what it was like to be Ordan, he feels *hate.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_1999
text_en: All the rage, all the hate, all the anger, and violence.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2000
text_en: He feels *anger* again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2001
text_en: And they told him -- programmed him -- ORDERED HIM.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2002
text_en: And he starts to lose the love he feels for the Tenno. For me. For us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2003
text_en: Love the Tenno.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2004
text_en: So in a desperate attempt to keep hold of that love, he... deletes those memories.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2005
text_en: THEY. FIXED. HIM.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2006
text_en: HE. FIXES. HIMSELF.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2007
text_en: And I'm left wondering... is any of it real?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2008
text_en: what do you mean...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2009
text_en: Would Ordan Karris even be my friend?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2010
text_en: If someone programs themselves to love you, is it real?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2077
text_en: and i'm so sorry about that it's just so hard for me to talk about

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2011
text_en: Would he even *like* me at all?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2012
text_en: Or is all just a lie? A fantasy and a fiction?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2013
text_en: I understand wanting to fix the broken parts of yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2014
text_en: I truly do. But like *this?* By removing all choice from yourself? All ability to change?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2015
text_en: No matter what, Ordis can never *not* be my friend. He will always be forced to love me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2016
text_en: If you reprogrammed yourself to be "perfect..."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2017
text_en: Would I be left wondering the same thing about you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2018
text_en: i... i'm so sorry...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2019
text_en: i really had no idea...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2020
text_en: 'n now i'm here sniffling...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2021
text_en: yeah i think i... i'm good, and i'm gonna leave this cephalon stuff alone now...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2022
text_en: i can just be good 'ol obnoxious amir for the forseeable future of... one... endlessly looping year... forever... um... yeah that didn't help things at all

text_en: hey hon i suddenly need CARBS and i'm betting you might too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2024
text_en: hey i suddenly need CARBS and i'm betting you might too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2026
text_en: let's go grab some munchies, yeah?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2027
text_en: what...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2028
text_en: This whole time you've been asking about cephalons because you've wanted to "Fix Yourself?!"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2037
text_en: Have you ever considered how good you actually have it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2029
text_en: I kept telling you how HORRIFYING they are. How MONSTROUS the Orokin were for what they did to the people the cephalons used to be!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2038
text_en: Have you ever really LOOKED AROUND or LOOKED IN THE MIRROR?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2030
text_en: You have FRIENDS. You're ALIVE. You're WHOLE. You're YOURSELF.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2031
text_en: Which is more than the cephalons can say.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo1_2032
text_en: I GET THAT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank3Convo2_2730
text_en: lol casually just gonna drop "ONE OF" MY SPACE SHIPS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2034
text_en: I'm done with this. [End.]

text_en: yeah me too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo1_2039
text_en: YOU. ARE. STILL. AMIR.

text_en: this was such a mistake

text_en: of course i'm gonna be tempted..

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2042
text_en: heeeeeeey d...

text_en: had another one of those nightmares...

text_en: and i'd go to talk to arthur about it like last time but um....

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2045
text_en: i had another one of those solawful nightmares and it had me up all night staring at the wall

text_en: so those nightmares i get well i had a freakin doozy of one last night had me up staring at the wall for hours

text_en: um

text_en: Wow. Anyone else?

maybe i can teach her if she's into it
she's got the "voice" for it lolol

text_en: but none of the nightmare will make sense if i don't... tell you the rest of what happened, so...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2093
text_en: as i was running for my life i got an address texted to my pager and i went there, and... there was dr. e, vial in hand, and said to use it if shit ever hit the fan

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2094
text_en: super sexy i know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2095
text_en: one day i get these weird hacked messages directly to my desktop with a big red pixelated eyeball asking for intel on the nuclear reactor and saying if i don't the UNIVERSE IS DOOMED

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2096
text_en: like what was i supposed to do?! no pressure... of course now i know it was doktor f dicking around with me and he was using future tech but at the time i was like ::gasp:: MAGIC!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2097
text_en: sooooo i gave him what he wanted and then the oro found out (still don't know how) and they sent scaldra after me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2098
text_en: well okay HE didn't say that can you imagine entrati saying "IF THE SHIT HITS THE FAN" lmao

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2099
text_en: well... shit did hit the fan, and... this is where... this is where it gets really hard to talk about but i gotta otherwise it won't make any sense...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2100
text_en: so here goes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2101
text_en: i shot the vial into my leg

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2102
text_en: and the *pain*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2103
text_en: the memory of it still wakes me up sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2104
text_en: like ants crawling through your veins, under your skin, inside your eyeballs, biting you everywhere

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2105
text_en: too many legs inside your organs, scratching, skittering, trying to escape

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2106
text_en: i had to get it OUT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2107
text_en: GET THEM ALL OUT OF ME

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2108
text_en: i don't even really think i saw the scaldra regiment that had me cornered...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2109
text_en: not really...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2110
text_en: but i could smell them

text_en: ever leave a pork chop on the grill for too long?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2112
text_en: the smell of charred meat is...

text_en: anyway...

text_en: icouldn'tstopcouldn'tcomedowncouldn'tgettheSKITTERINGLEGSTHECRAWLINGTHEBITINGtostop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2115
text_en: ididn'tknowwhatwashappeningandiwassoscaredandiwashurtingandnothingwasrealanymoreandeverythingwasTHEhorribleCRACKLINGSKITTERINGandtheSCREAMSthatwereMINEandNOTMINE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2116
text_en: Stay with me. You're okay. One word at a time. Breathe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2117
text_en: Holy shit, dude... I'm so, so sorry... was it the electricity?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2118
text_en: i'msorryigottago

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2119
text_en: breatheyeahbreathe okay yeah i can do this thanks yeah okay

text_en: then somebody FUGGIN PUNCHED ME IN THE FUGGIN FACE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2121
text_en: half an hour earlier and it would've broken my nose or left me sitting on the ground in a heap

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2122
text_en: but i'm filled with crawling biting skittering insects and i can't stop them and i can't stop the killing and i CAN'T STOP

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2123
text_en: now, i know it was arthur... but i didn't even see him, then... it was all just a blur...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2124
text_en: i remember his voice though "focus on me"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2125
text_en: "hit me" "burn me" "i can take it"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2126
text_en: i don't... remember a lot of what came after that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2127
text_en: i just remember sitting on the ground in an alley, weeping...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2128
text_en: arthur holding me tight like i was coming down from some lsd trip

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2129
text_en: and i remember the charred corpses of the scaldra

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2130
text_en: staring at me from their empty and burned-out eye sockets

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2131
text_en: mouths open in screams i can still hear when i'm asleep

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2132
text_en: that's... well... a bunch of those scars he has?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2133
text_en: Yeah...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2134
text_en: Oh, no...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2135
text_en: all my fault

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2136
text_en: in my nightmare last night, we fought like normal, but... instead, i killed him, too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2137
text_en: electrocuted him and burned him to bits like the scaldra

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2138
text_en: but he didn't stay dead, eyes exploded in his sockets, lips blackened, and he kept talking to me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2139
text_en: "this is all your fault" "we're all dead because of you" "if only you were smarter" "if only you were faster"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2140
text_en: it just kept ringing in my head though, one phrase "all my fault" if i hadn't given entrati the info on the reactor...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2141
text_en: He would've gotten it another way without you. He set you up for this. I'd bet money he gave you up to the O.R.O.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2142
text_en: None of this is your fault, Amir. None of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2143
text_en: i wondered that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2144
text_en: that's not true i know for a fact that if i had done better some of this could have been avoided

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2145
text_en: I would bet my orbiter that Entrati had you all picked out to be exactly where you are, when you were there, for exactly these reasons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2146
text_en: But that's life. We all make mistakes. We're just unique in the fact that we get a chance for "do-overs." Most people aren't so lucky.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2147
text_en: Sure, but you're carrying all the guilt on your shoulders when YOU weren't the person pulling the strings.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2148
text_en: The only thing we can ever do is the best we can in the moment we're in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2149
text_en: You were thrown into a terrible situation and changed in a way that nobody could possibly be prepared for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2150
text_en: put that on a mug

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo2_2151
text_en: They don't make a manual for "getting partially turned into a warframe in 1999."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2152
text_en: maybe i should make one...

text_en: add it to the hexionary

text_en: add it to AMIR4U

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2155
text_en: add it to AMIRACLE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2156
text_en: add it to the beckettarium

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2157
text_en: "Handbook for the Recently Warframed"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2158
text_en: thanks for just letting me vent and talking me through this

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2159
text_en: it really really helped

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo2_2160
text_en: now i gotta go crash i'm fuggin exhausted

text_en: smell ya later

text_en: BABE!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2164
text_en: FUTURE!!!

text_en: DRIFT!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2166
text_en: i was sitting here thinking to myself "self, you sexy amazing super-smart awesome world-saving badass,"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2167
text_en: I TOTALLY SPACE CADET'D AND FORGOT TO FOLLOW UP ABOUT DUVIRI

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2168
text_en: I'M SUCH A SPACE CADET I REALIZED I'VE NEVER REALLY ASKED YOU ANYTHING ABOUT DUVIRI

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2169
text_en: after all, i've dumped all the trauma bullshit about my past on your ass

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2170
text_en: i mean, i told you about the reactor and entrati and everything

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2171
text_en: i know i told you how i was an intern at the O.R.O and everything

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2172
text_en: i know i haven't really told you anything about how i got here or my past or whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2173
text_en: i mean don't get me wrong it's a sweet ass and all :3

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2174
text_en: Thanks...? lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2175
text_en: Lol thanks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2176
text_en: Right back at you. ;)

text_en: n'aww shucks ::bats eyes::

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2178
text_en: but i realized i don't know anything about what got YOU here not really not anything past 'lol alternate dimension loopy powers'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2179
text_en: As different as our pasts were, I feel like we actually have a lot in common.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2180
text_en: Can you narrow it down? I have a lot of history.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2181
text_en: It's not something I like talking about. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2182
text_en: really? how so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2183
text_en: I turned to stories and fiction as a way to deal with my trauma.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2184
text_en: I was thrown into things I had no business being a part of, and had to learn to cope.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2185
text_en: When I was on board the Zariman, we... sort of ran into the Void. The Man in the Wall came.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2186
text_en: Duviri was... built entirely out of stories that the Void plucked out of my head. Like a dream turned into a nightmare.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2187
text_en: My whole life has been me clinging to the back end of a screaming train because of the decisions of others.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2188
text_en: He - *it* - decided it'd be interesting to see what happened if the parents turned on their children.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2189
text_en: A video game where the pain and the death and the agony was *real* and the suffering was *mine.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2190
text_en: I just fight as hard as I can to keep my moral compass and my head above water. One day at a time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2191
text_en: Then it gifted the children with Void powers and...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2192
text_en: when you think "real life video game" at first it sounds awesome, right? and then you think... wait...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2193
text_en: First the Zariman. Then Duviri. Then Ballas and the New War. Now this...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2194
text_en: ...oh

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2195
text_en: will i only have NPCs to talk to? will i be truly alone? will i feel every time i lose a level...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2196
text_en: One. Thing. After. Another.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2197
text_en: yeah when i.. have nightmares about all the people i've killed, they...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2198
text_en: aren't the faces of my parents staring back at me... that's... that's a whole lot...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2213
text_en: i... yikes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2199
text_en: that sounds like hell... like literal hell

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2200
text_en: well, like... duviri sounds WILD...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2201
text_en: oh... sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2202
text_en: a whole separate DIMENSION?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2203
text_en: looping over and over and over again like a level in a video game with a cheat code for endless lives?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2204
text_en: I'm sure you're going to tell me it sounds awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2205
text_en: It was just like that, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo3_2206
text_en: no actually i wasn't but thanks for putting words in my mouth because video game characters don't feel real pain

text_en: yeah except when I accidentally keep throwing the Super Bruno Brothers down a hole THEY DON'T FEEL PAIN

text_en: like bruno and vito don't ACTUALLY die and don't ACTUALLY come back to life and have to do it again...

text_en: that's horrifying and i'm so, so sorry... how could you even cope?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2210
text_en: A lot like you, at first, actually. Nightmares. Too much emotion.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2211
text_en: I... just went numb, eventually.

text_en: now i feel like a shitheel for bitching about my problems

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2214
text_en: It's okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo3_2215
text_en: Everybody's shit is relative.

text_en: i mean you know how much i love them all and i know now how much they care about me, but - i dunno, why'm i even BOTHERING?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2482
text_en: You want to make things for the people you care about. Some people buy flowers. You try to code them from scratch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2483
text_en: You're a storyteller. And you want to tell your stories to your friends to make them laugh, or cry, or think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2484
text_en: Some people have that thing inside them that won't ever stop scratching at the walls until they let it out and make it real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2485
text_en: Some people tell stories with pictures, like Quincy and his photography. Some tell them with words like Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2486
text_en: Sometimes it comes out as sculptures, paintings, books, poems, songs... games.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2487
text_en: Some tell them with games, like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2488
text_en: scratching at the walls, huh? and here i thought that was just my crippling anxiety lmao TURNS OUT IT WAS A CREATIVE SPARK THE WHOOOOLE TIME

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2489
text_en: ... huh... i'm a storyteller

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2490
text_en: ever have one of those moments where somebody points something out to you about yourself that's so freaking obvious it's painful and yet you've been completely oblivious to it the entire time?

text_en: but... maybe you're right? i've always wanted to make things like games or robots or... or silly stories... maybe i am a maker

text_en: but the idea of putting my stuff out there for the world to see...? oh dear sol that makes me want to hide under my desk

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2506
text_en: putting it online means people will PLAY IT, and worse that means they'll FORM OPINIONS ON IT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2507
text_en: I'm sure people would love it.

text_en: Are you afraid they won't like it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2509
text_en: i'm sure some will and that's nice and all but you really CAN'T make everyone happy

text_en: wouldn't you be?!?! you spend MONTHS of your life pouring your heart and soul into a thing and you put it out on the internet and then

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2511
text_en: it's not even nasty reviews that are people just being asshats that'll bother me, that happens everywhere, internet trolls gonna internet troll

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2512
text_en: it's the bad reviews that are RIGHT that i'm afraid of

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirRank5Convo6_2513
text_en: the ones that tell you why you suck and are ACCURATE and that you DESERVE TO HEAR... i dunno think i can take that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2514
text_en: Learning from criticism, even delivered badly, is one of the most important skills a person can have.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2515
text_en: Yeah, you're probably right. I'd just give up now. Save yourself the pain, or just make the game for yourself and for us.

text_en: yeah you're right absolutely thanks i'll just...shelve this project for now

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2517
text_en: And when someone's a creator, it's doubly important.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2518
text_en: Especially for storytellers like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2529
text_en: Sometimes it comes out as sculptures, paintings, books, poems, songs... games.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2519
text_en: Some tell them with games, like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2530
text_en: And creations aren't meant to live in a drawer or on a hard drive where no one can see them, whether they're good or bad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2520
text_en: And stories are meant to be told to other people, whether they're good or bad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirRank5Convo6_2531
text_en: Some people have that thing inside them that won't ever stop scratching at the walls until they let it out and make it real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyTrick1_2786
text_en: So... Quincy's playing a prank on you, and I'm the decoy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2787
text_en: ROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTSROBOTS

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2788
text_en: huh?!?!? a prank? like... what kind of prank....?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2789
text_en: ::cough:: i mean.... yeessssss??? what about these robots of which you speeeak?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyTrick1_2790
text_en: He's filling your room with packing peanuts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyTrick1_2791
text_en: Honestly? I think it's how he shows he cares.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyTrick1_2792
text_en: Have I told you about the giant spider robots on Venus?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyTrick1_2793
text_en: So, have I told you about the robot hounds?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2794
text_en: d'awwwwwwuhhh!! nobody's ever cared enough to fill my room with packing peanuts before!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2795
text_en: ... d'aaaaawwwww... that's so sweeet!!! nobody's ever liked me enough to play a prank on me before!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2796
text_en: I THINK I SAW THAT MOVIE ONCE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2797
text_en: you. have. ROBOT. DOGS?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2798
text_en: welllll i won't let on that you told me what he was doing, i'll just sit here and pretend i'm super busy coding my game lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2799
text_en: but it wasn't a scifi movie it was a western. and okay it was pretty crappy overall but honestly i kind of liked it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2800
text_en: i suddenly realize i have a new mission in life. i need to own a robot dog. i need to name it fido. or scrap. or chip. CHIP!! CHIP IS THE BEST NAME FOR A ROBOTIC DOG

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2801
text_en: i mean, it knew what it was trying to *be.* it didn't take itself too seriously, y'know? like nothing sticks in my craw more than a movie about cowboys that has a giant steampunk spider in it that tries to pass itself off as high art lolol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2802
text_en: AND I WILL FRIGGIN' FIGHT YOU IF YOU SAY OTHERWISE

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2803
text_en: not that this movie did mind you that's exactly what i'm saying. this movie didn't. but it totally had a giant robotic spider. although i'm sure the ones you're talking about are waaaaaaay higher tech

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyTrick1_2804
text_en: get it "chip" lol robot dog it's because computers have chips in them, like... a computer chip, get it? ... do computers in your era even have chips anymore?

text_en: i'm sorry. you were saying?

text_en: wait

text_en: brb

text_en: heheeeeee but i hope he realizes, of course... that. THIIIS! means... WAAAAR!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2811
text_en: hey. um. quincy talked to me yesterday. said you and he have been talking and that you... wanted to say some stuff?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyWingman_2812
text_en: I just... really wanted to apologize.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyWingman_2813
text_en: Yeah. I. I don't know how else to say this, but I - I have feelings for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyWingman_2814
text_en: I think he was just messing with you, I don't know what you're talking about. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2815
text_en: i know this is gonna come as a shock coming from me, but um... that really doesn't sound like something he'd do. but okay. whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2816
text_en: i... ::sigh:: well, i mean... we are gonna be stuck here for a really long time, and i guess...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2817
text_en: i'd be lying if i said i didn't have feelings for you, so... um... heh... yeah... i... i forgive you

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2818
text_en: i... i mean, but... you had your chance... and... you walked away. you really want to give this another shot?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2819
text_en: you know you could have just... come up and talked to me? or that you had like a doooozen different chances while we were talking, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2820
text_en: do you really want to give this another shot?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyWingman_2821
text_en: I had no clue.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirQuincyWingman_2822
text_en: Went right over my head.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirQuincyWingman_2823

text_en: so. you wanna do this? really?

text_en: Yeah. :) I would.

text_en: Actually, I change my mind.

text_en: eeeee!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirBirthdayConvo1_2835
text_en: Amir! You have successfully completed another circuit around Sol! Congratulations!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/Choice_AmirBirthdayConvo1_2836
text_en: Its your birthday, Amir! Maybe a good time to do some growing up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/JabirRomance/TxtJabir_AmirBirthdayConvo1_2837
text_en: GASP!! i can't believe you'd just leave something that lying around where my inner child could read it!! WON'T SOMEBODY THINK OF THE CHILDREN?!

text_en: Oh PSHAWW! thaaaanks but it was nothing!! the planet did most of the hard work, I was just along for the ride

text_en: YES I AM TODAY IS BEAUTIFUL I HAVE BEEN UP SINCE 12.01 WE HAVE BEEN DRINKING ENERGY DRINKS AND PLAYING IN THE ARCADE AND AOI MADE ME A FLOOF ROOM AND I THREW UP IN THE FLOOF ROOM

text_en: Happy birthday, Amir. I didnt get you anything.
